nodes.text: The Crimson Casino was a casino and a bar located on The Wheel.

The Crimson Casino was located on the upper level of The Wheel, and only the extremely wealthy were allowed in. When Luke Skywalker, Princess Leia Organa, Han Solo and Chewbacca arrived on The Wheel shortly after the Battle of Yavin, they agreed to meet in this casino, although only Chewbacca actually made it because all the others were captured by Wheel Security Force. However, Chewbacca hadn't paid his registration fee and got into a fight with a Mandallian Giant.
